Package backend

Class DataManipulator

java.lang.Object
backend.DataManipulator
public class DataManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
DataManipulator class owns Record, Database, writer and reader classes It includes methods for adding, editing and removing, records

    • getRowsfromCsv

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> getRowsfromCsv​(java.lang.String filepath) throws java.io.IOException, com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
      Reads and returns valid and invalid rows from csv in double dimensional array list object
      Parameters:
      filepath - contains the string representation of the file path
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing two objects, the first is a list containing a list of valid records and a list of invalid records, and the second is a boolean stating whether the file is valid
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      com.opencsv.exceptions.CsvValidationException
